examples.korean: I think I lost my tooth library. 발음듣기 나 내가 모으던 치아들을 잃어버린 것 같아. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. cielcine(ciel****) Web Collection

examples.korean: He squinted at the letter in his hand. 발음듣기 그가 눈을 가늘게 모아 뜨고 손에 든 편지를 보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Tie the two ropes together with a knot. 발음듣기 두 밧줄을 함께 모아 매듭을 묶어라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Tie the two ropes together with a knot. 발음

examples.korean: He amassed a fortune from silver mining. 발음듣기 그는 은광업으로 큰 재산을 모았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He amassed a fortune from silver mining. 발음

examples.korean: She held the bird gently in cupped hands. 발음듣기 그녀는 두 손을 모아 새를 부드럽게 잡았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She held the bird gently in cupped hands. 발음
